entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 40%
